weak_ref_alive: With this function you can check the weak reference to a struct to see if it is still "alive" or not. You supply the weak reference to check (as returned by the function weak_ref_create()), and the function will return true if the struct is still being referenced somewhere or false if it's not and has been garbage collected. Note that if you supply a value that is not a weak reference, the function will return undefined.
The weak reference to the struct you want to check.
The above code checks a weak reference to a struct and if it is still alive the variable referencing it is set to -1, de-referencing the struct and enabling it to be garbage collected.
